pull.title: tests: shrink feature_taproot transfer of funds tx
pull.body: When moving funds from node 1 to node 0 for the pre-activation tests, there can be a large number of inputs, potentially resulting in a tx that is larger than standardness rules allow, or that takes a long time to sign. This just takes the top 500 outputs, which is plenty (~90% of the wallet balance).

events.body:
On a sluggish Intel Core i7-6500U CPU @ 2.50GHz Ã— 4, two runs each, ~28 seconds faster

```
master
real	4m8.402s
user	5m30.459s

patch
real	3m39.194s
user	4m52.800s
sys	    0m12.868s

master
real	3m58.595s
user	5m15.567s
sys	    0m12.140s

patch
real	3m31.601s
user	4m47.992s
sys	    0m12.036s
```

events.message: tests: shrink feature_taproot transfer of funds tx

events.body: Rebased further back in history so it's easy to backport to 0.21, and simplified to just pick the 500 unspents with the highest amount, rather than doing many transactions.

rename.from: tests: split feature_taproot transfer of funds into smaller txs
rename.to: tests: shrink feature_taproot transfer of funds tx
